# Welcome to the Providers System ðŸŽ‰


Starting from **2.0.0**, the app will migrate from embedded providers to dynamic ones. This allows users to choose where and how to get content based on their preferences.


![](https://i.imgur.com/eLPjt1l.png)


### Brief info about providers


A provider, commonly known as _extension_, _source_ or _addon_, is an external feature that is separated from the app. It handles content generation such as media catalogs.


For those familiar with _Cloudstream3_ and _Stremio_, this new dynamic provider system will feel right at home as it was mainly inspired by them. If you are new to this concept, **think of the app as a browser while the providers are the browser extensions**
